name: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType
desc: Options for specifying different kinds of instance types.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: An option specifying that the instance uses the default characteristics.

items.name: case userID
items.desc: An option specifying that the instance contains a user identifier.

items.name: case motion
items.desc: An option specifying that the instance contains motion data.
